FIT3 is the single largest fitness lifestyle store in North America. More than just mass merchandise, FIT3 presents the full gamut of name brand fitness equipment, apparel and footwear, along with the widest selection of healthy lifestyle products including vitamins and nutritional supplements. Discover all the top-tier brands and the latest innovations in equipment and gear â€“ all under one roof!

FIT3 also carries an extensive collection of specialty products for yoga, boxing, martial arts and running, as well as a state-of-the-art 3D Gait technology that guarantees the perfect footwear fit. And for those who like to stretch and sweat their limits check out our in-store boxing ring and running track for a change in pace. Then take a breather and find your inner OM at our yoga studio with free classes 7 days a week.

FIT3 is a mecca for merchandise. A haven for healthy choices. A virtual runway for sportswear fashion and footwear with functionality to boot. And itâ€™s a playground to experiment in and explore your fitness potential. Feel inspired today.
